job_history.work_description: Taught Theater Arts 1-4, Technical Theater and Theater Arts Production to grades 9-12. Directed U.I.L. One Act Play, Fall Play Production or Musical, and maintained professional and student memberships, auditions, travel and workshops.

job_history.role_name: Secondary English III & TAAS Language Arts Teacher
job_history.work_description: Taught Secondary English & Literature; TAAS Language Arts 9th-11th. Provided preparatory and remediation TAAS Language Arts tutoring and administered TAAS testing.

job_history.role_name: Secondary English III & Theater Arts I Teacher
job_history.work_description: Taught English III and Beginning Theater Arts for grades 9-12. Co-sponsored Thespians and directed Children's Show Production.
Assisted with classroom management, co-directed class plays, and helped with UIL one act play competition.

job_history.role_name: Acting and Creative Dramatics Theater Teacher
job_history.work_description: Implemented lesson plans in creative dramatic projects, singing, dancing, and voice. Conducted activities, instructed small groups, and provided whole class instruction.
Taught Elementary Creative Dramatics for Children's Courtyard Daycare Centers. Led whole class instruction and group performances.
Mentored Speech and English students. Provided instruction of small groups and whole class instruction.
Provided one on one instruction, instructed small groups, and provided whole class instruction.
